example.name: autogen1
example.text: -- Prevent companies that have made leveraged buy-outs from getting federal tax refunds resulting from losses caused by interest payments on debt issued to finance the buy-outs , effective Aug. 2 , 1989 .
example.arg: companies that have made leveraged buy-outs ---> *-1
